import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import*as THREE from'three';import{OrbitControls}from'three/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Planner(){const mountRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const mountNode=mountRef.current;if(!mountNode)return;// Scene Setup

const ambientLight=new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff,0.5);scene.add(ambientLight);const directionalLight=new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,1);directionalLight.position.set(5,10,7);directionalLight.castShadow=true;directionalLight.shadow.mapSize.width=2048;directionalLight.shadow.mapSize.height=2048;directionalLight.shadow.camera.near=0.5;directionalLight.shadow.camera.far=100;scene.add(directionalLight);// Resize Handling
